sentence.Network_en: SOI - based VOA devices are packaged for the first time.
sentence.Network_cn: 利用上述方法研制出了完整封装的SOI基可变光学衰减器样品.

sentence.Network_en: The micro - actuators are fabricated by use of DRIE on SOI wafer.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文中的微执行器采用深层反应离子刻蚀(DRIE)技术在硅隔离衬底(SOI)硅片上制作.

sentence.Network_en: AMD switched to silicon - on - insulator ( SOI ); Intel stayed with bulk silicon.
sentence.Network_cn: AMD转向了 绝缘体上硅 ( SOI ), 而intel仍然使用体硅.
